steps.content: ‘Properties’ displays the information regarding the dataflow, reporting obligation and legal instrument (extracted from ROD)
‘API-key’ displays a dialog showing the parameters which are needed to access the Reportnet 3 API
‘Manage reporters’ displays a dialog where a lead reporter can provide access to the dataflow for other reporters
The main part of the page are icons which take you to the components of the dataflow:
1. The dataflow help – documents, links and technical overview of the reporting schema
3. The reporting dataset where data and information are submitted
4. ‘Release to data collection’ for submitting your reported data
